Posts.Content: Hi everyone I’m new to this forum, I’m 35 and I’ve been diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer about 2 months ago, it has spread to numerous bones, really just wondering has anyone else got this same type and any advice or info as I’ve just started hormone injections and am due to start a chemo tablet soon but kind of struggling to take it all in as I have don’t know anyone with the same cancer, any info or people’s own stories would be greatly appreciated  thank you  M
Posts.Title: new member stage 4 breast cancer
